easy_steps_title: Easy steps to get started with Fastwork
choose_service_button: Choose a service that you want.
employer_step1_title: Choose a service that you want.
employer_step1_description: Discover and choose freelancers from the following categories:
employer_step2_list1: You can talk to freelancers for details and price of work
employer_step2_list2: If the details of employment have been agreed, Freelancers will send you a quote.
employer_step2_list3: The system does not allow you to send LINE, phone number, email before payment
employer_step3_description: The system works as a mediator holding your money until a freelance completes his job.
employer_step3_list2: You can make payment via Fastwork by the following methods:
employer_step3_list7: After payment successfully, you can exchange the personal contact info.
employer_step4_title: Wait for the freelancer to turn in your work.
employer_step4_description: Check out the delivered final work by freelancers.
employer_step4_list1: Click approve work, If submitted final work is matched with quotation agreement
employer_step4_list2: Freelancer will get cash credit only after you approved work
employer_step4_list3: Freelance work will be approved by the system within 7 days. If you do not review or submit a request to modify the work.
employer_step4_list4: You can reject the final work and allow freelancers to edit their work. This depends on the agreement of both parties.
employer_step4_list5: You can sue for the work. If the freelancer is not working as promised.
employer_step5_list1: Rate and Review buyer for the benefit of other freelancers
employer_step5_list2: Rate and review your satisfaction with Fastwork system to improve the service even further
seller_step1_title: Post your work on Fastwork to present your ability to buyer
seller_step1_description: Post your service under the following categories:
seller_step2_title: Discuss work details with freelancers and create quotation
seller_step2_description: Discuss the details and brief the job with the buyer.
seller_step2_list1: Discuss on work details and send a quote to buyer
seller_step2_list2: The system does not allow you to send LINE, phone number, email before payment
seller_step3_description: Client must pay via system before you start working.
seller_step3_list1: System will notify once payment is complete
seller_step4_description: Submit work via system and wait for client approval.
seller_step4_list1: Client can approve or request revisions
seller_step4_list2: Youâ€™ll receive credit after client approval or after 7 days
seller_step5_description: Build your reputation with great reviews.
seller_step5_list2: Encourage client to leave a review
